   Hugh Hewitt
   stated on July 15, 2018 in in a panel discussion:
   Says FBI agent Peter Strzok’s hearing confirmed Republican Congressman Jim
   Jordan’s theory about how the Justice Department got the Steele dossier.

Alternate routes to Bruce Ohr

   The Strzok hearing did reveal that Bruce Ohr gave the Steele dossier to
   the FBI.

Our ruling

   Hewitt said FBI agent Peter Strzok’s hearing confirmed Republican
   Congressman Jim Jordan’s theory about how the Justice Department got the
   Steele dossier.

Share the Facts
   PolitiFact Rating:
   False
   Says FBI agent Peter Strzok’s hearing confirmed Republican Congressman Jim
   Jordan’s theory about how the Justice Department got the Steele dossier.
